nodes.text:
This 2-1B surgical droid was stationed inside the Jedi Temple on the planet of Coruscant around 21 BBY during the time of the Clone Wars.
The droid patched up Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi after his staged "assassination" death and loaded the facial transformation program to morph his physical features to exactly match that of the bounty hunter Rako Hardeen.

The droid first appeared in the fifteenth episode of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series' fourth season, titled "Deception". He was voiced by Corey Burton, the actor who also portrays bounty hunter Cad Bane.
